data.title: Kevin and Perry may go large again
data.meta_description: Be afraid, be very afraid. Heat magazine reports that following the phenomenal success in the UK of Kevin and Perry Go Large, a sequel is being considered
data.text:
Be afraid, be very afraid. Heat magazine reports this week that following its phenomenal success in the UK (box-office takings of Â£6m in its first 10 days), Kevin & Perry could be going large, again.

Although most reviewers commented on the film's failure to sustain what is essentially a 5-minute sketch idea in a 90-minute feature film, an insider told the magazine: "We always thought there might be more scope from these two characters than just one film." But he added that Enfield, who co-wrote and co-produced the movie, would not consider a sequel until he sees how well his film fares in the US.
